Program Description \n(guideline): 50% of total equipment and installation costs for non-managed Level 2 EV Charger, up to $500. Limit 2 chargers per account.
Other Restrictions: Permanently installed charger with a dedicated circuit breaker. Limit 2 chargers per account.

Program Description \n(guideline): 50% of total costs for Managed Level 2 EV Charger, up to $1000. Must enroll in either DrivEV Smart Charging Rewards or Time of Use program.
Other Restrictions: Permanently installed charger with a dedicated circuit breaker. Limit 2 chargers per account. Must be enrolled in either DrivEV Smart Charging Rewards or Time-of-Use Rate program.

Program Description \n(guideline): 50% of total costs for publicly accessible Level 2 EV Charger, up to $1000. Must have the ability to record charge session data.
Other Restrictions: Must be accessible to the public. Must have the ability to record charge session data.

Program Description \n(guideline): Up to $7000 for publicy accessible Level 3 DC Fast EV Charger, depending on max output. Evaluated on a case-by-case basis.
Equipment Standards Restrictions:
50-75 kW max output – $3,000.
76-149 kW max output – $5,000.
150+ kW max output – $7000.
Other Restrictions:
Must be accessible to the public.

Chargers at this level are evaluated on a case-by-case basis. Please contact the Energy Resources Department to see if your Level 3 charger qualifies.
